column5: Oh and I don‚Äôt get along with boyfriends family so I‚Äôm really just stuck and nothing to do today in addition to my own family not inviting me to their festivities on today
My family didn‚Äôt invite me to Christmas this year because of family differences. Same with Thanksgiving. Fuck them all I‚Äôm watching The Good Place on Netflix and sulking in depression
100% Of the time

Happy fucking merry Christmas and whatever comes along. Hope your next year is better than your last. This year has really been a test of my faith. Hopefully I win and keep my sanity and my home. Lol no seriously though merry new year folks.
I ended up getting a call for another job
So very true
Exactly
Yup it was HireVue with me as well. Mail room clerk and another for an order builder
My own family is competitive and toxic. That‚Äôs why I stay far away. More of an introvert than anything
Yes I felt as if she didn‚Äôt think about me or my feelings. I never went to prom, I didn‚Äôt even go to my high school graduation. It was very disappointing
Hope is beyond lost at this point
More like sis lol
Yes. I think that church is a business to help ‚Äúpastors‚Äù to get rich.
Agreed. This earth is pure hell. I always think of what I‚Äôve must‚Äôve done in my past life to receive the life that I‚Äôve been given. Since childhood it‚Äôs been hell.
That means so much to hear it
It‚Äôs so hard to stay productive with so much on your mind
Visit that friend. It would mean the world to that friend. You never know how that may change that friends concept, especially on a holiday
Yes, and sorry for your loss. My mom committed suicide when I was 16 and I still don‚Äôt understand

I just wish I had someone to talk to that understands how much I hate life as a whole. I hate hearing that I am weak, or that I just need to go ahead and off myself. It‚Äôs exasperating. I just want to die. I wish that I could go so peacefully. There are murderers and rapists and criminals who died in their sleep peacefully..but young children raped and tortured to death. I don‚Äôt understand the logic
I did a lousy one today. I don‚Äôt think I cared too much I did it in the car. But I was called for another job shortly after. Why am I not excited?
I thought that I was the only one. I hate to see the sun coming through the blinds every....fucking...morning
The holidays make it so much worse. I literally deleted all of my social media. It‚Äôs so draining and depressing
Fuck friends they don‚Äôt exist in our world
Totally understand but try to find a happy place. I‚Äôm preaching as if I don‚Äôt feel the same. But hopefully my words can help
Find your happy place. I lost mine long ago. Still trying to find it. If you need someone to talk to I‚Äôm here. You may not know me but I know your pain
So true. The shower makes me even more depressed. I sit and loathe in the bottom of the tub and let the water run on me
Still let them know. You never know what difference that it will make. I wish I knew how my mom felt and her thoughts before she committed suicide. Now I live in regret

I understand that you have a bond with your cat. Only makes me feel bad for neglecting my dog after a breakup and taking my anger out on her.  Don‚Äôt feel that way. It‚Äôs like how I felt when my daughter and mom passed away. Just hold on and don‚Äôt give in if that does take place. Keep the memories. They will keep you going sometimes. Just cherish your cat as much as you can.
Great for you. Keep busy
Yes that‚Äôs why I take PM pills every night to get me through
üëçüèΩ
Ok if you say so
I wish that I could talk to you. I really wish that someone understood what I‚Äôm going through
No one cares. If they did, I wouldn‚Äôt feel this way. At all. Everyone will care once it‚Äôs too late. It‚Äôs the holidays and this is getting worse

I don‚Äôt have anyone. My family disowned me due to personal decisions. I just feel this empty void. I hate feeling. I hate breathing. I hate it and I hope that everyone thinks that it‚Äôs not serious. Them and everyone else will regret how I‚Äôve been treated and abandoned. In due time.
I hate hearing that bullshit. No one understands

I wish that I could die peacefully in my sleep. Every morning that I wake up, I hate to see the sunlight peeking through the blinds. It reminds me that I made it through another night. I hate to wake up, I hate to see that I have to get through another depressing day. I hate living. I wish that I had a shitload of sleeping pills maybe Xanax I can‚Äôt get ahold to any. I‚Äôve been trying. I hate it here. I feel useless, I feel drained. I feel empty and lost.
